description: This file defines the RoleNotifier class, a state management utility in Flutter that listens to role changes from AuthService and notifies UI components accordingly. It manages user roles within the app, providing methods to get, set, and reset roles, and listens to role streams for real-time updates.

classes.name: RoleNotifier
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages user role state by interfacing with AuthService and listening to role stream updates.

methods.name: RoleNotifier
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the RoleNotifier, setting up role stream subscription and default role from AuthService.

methods.name: role
methods.description: Getter to access the current role.

methods.name: setRole
methods.description: Sets a new role via AuthService.

methods.name: resetRole
methods.description: Resets the role to a default or neutral state via AuthService.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cancels the role stream subscription and disposes of resources.
